Address.label: Address
Address.value: 405 S 8TH STREET,SUITE 201, BOISE, Idaho, 83702, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Perpetua Resources Corp is focused on the exploration, site restoration, and redevelopment of gold-antimony-silver deposits in the Stibnite-Yellow Pine district of central Idaho that are encompassed by the Stibnite Gold Project. The Project is one of the highest-grade, open-pit gold deposits in the United States and is designed to apply a modern, responsible mining approach to restore an abandoned mine site and produce both gold and the only mined source of antimony in the United States.
